effect.short: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
effect.full: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the
target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
